EmailTemplate.name: Desktop - Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Master Administrator Claim
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Contact}, Regarding {!Case.Account}
Thank you for submitting documents regarding (company name) for the Master Administrator Primary Contact change.
We are happy to inform you that your request to change the Master Administrator Primary Contact of your QuickBooks Desktop account has been approved. You can sign in to CAMPS.intuit.com using the Master Administrator Primary Contact user ID and password to verify these changes and see if any other changes are required.
If you have any further questions regarding this change, please contact support at (800)-446-8848.
Sincerely,
The QuickBooks Desktop Support Team
